alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Gogebic; Houghton; Keweenaw; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 9:09PM EST until December 03 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow, gusty winds, blowing snow, and rapidly falling temperatures expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with lower amounts of a coating to 3 inches at lower elevations and at locations well inland from Lake Superior to the east of Marenisco and south of Paulding. Northwest winds gusting to as high as around 45 mph will create blowing snow. Temperatures rapidly falling below freezing while snow is falling could lead to flash freeze conditions on roadways. * WHERE...Portions of central Upper and western Upper Michigan. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause a few power outages.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Baraga; Gogebic; Houghton; Keweenaw; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton
